title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Beat eggs and mix with Parmesan.
Combine pasta with pancetta and remove from heat.
Quickly stir in egg and cheese mixture.
Season with black pepper and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices for 2 hours.
Fry onion and garlic, add tomato puree.
Stir in cream and serve with rice.
